content: उपकरणं {@--1@} Doing service or favour, helping, assisting. {@--2@} Material, implement, instrument, means; स्वेषूपकरणेषु <ls>U. 5</ls>; °द्रव्यं <ls>Mk. 3</ls>; उपकरणीभावमायाति <ls>U. 3. 3</ls> serve as helping instruments, or assistants; परोपकारोपकरणं शरीरं <ls>K. 207</ls>; so स्नान° bathing materials; <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; व्यायाम° athletic materials; आत्मा परोपकरणीकृतः <ls>H. 2. 24</ls>; <ls>K. 80</ls>, <ls n="K.">102</ls>, <ls n="K.">198</ls>, <ls n="K.">204</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 276</ls>, <ls>Ms. 9. 270.</ls> {@--3@} An engine, machine, apparatus, paraphernalia (in general). {@--4@} Means of subsistence, anything supporting life. {@--5@} A means or expedient; कर्म°, वेद°, यज्ञ° &c. {@--6@} Fabricating, composing, elaborating. {@--7@} The insignia of royalty. {@--8@} The attendants of a king.
